In the Residence C District, the following regulations
shall apply.

No building shall be erected, altered or used
and no lot or premises shall be used except for one or more of the
following purposes:
Public, free schools, libraries or public museums.

Accessory uses customarily incident to the above uses.
No accessory use shall be erected within five feet of any side or
rear line or nearer than 50 feet to any street line.
A mixed-use occupancy of any building or parcel of real property, even where such uses are permitted pursuant to § 225-25 of this Article, is hereby prohibited.

No building shall be erected to a height in
excess of 35 feet.

No building shall occupy more than 40% of the
area of the lot.

No building shall hereafter be erected or altered
on a lot of less area than 1,800 square feet.

There shall be a rear yard, the depth of which
shall not be less than 20 feet.

There shall be a front yard, the depth of which
shall not be less than 20 feet.

Two side yards shall be provided on every lot,
the aggregate width of which shall be at least 30 feet. Neither side
yard shall be less than five feet.

In the case of a corner lot, a building shall
be required to be set back 20 feet from each street line.
